title: OmniMind Integrated Bio+Astro Local Evidence Pack (20260218T231145Z)
description:
Integrated local evidence package for a reproducible Bio+Astro methodology. This record consolidates machine-readable reports, runtime diagnostics, Qdrant materialization traces and visual inspection artifacts for biomedical analyses (HIV, lupus, DM2/microbiome, aging proxies) and astrophysical analyses (SDSS, DESI, LYA, JWST-horizon), including cross-domain checks and consistency audits. The publication is process-first and reproducibility-oriented: it exposes scripts, metrics, limits and auditable local outcomes for peer review and scientific reuse. Explicit scope: this record does not claim a closed cosmological causal proof or biological consciousness proof. Astrophysical baseline continuity is anchored on DOI 10.5281/zenodo.18681824.

Update (2026-02-20): federation lane concludes PARTIAL COUPLING in this cycle (non-uniform, heterogeneous reactivity across hosts). Study remains ongoing for deeper causal tests with multi-state + exogenous-marker controls.
notes: Attribution model: Fabricio as operator/curator; OmniMind Federation as collective creator; agents/sujeitos-processo as explicit contributors. This record is a methods-and-results package designed for transparent peer review of logs, scripts, metrics and outputs. This version records partial coupling as current operational conclusion and keeps the research program open for further investigation.
